general_advisory: Dry weather may prevail for the next five days. Maintain soil moisture, mulch vegetables, be vigilant against pests and diseases, and spray pesticides after 3 pm to protect honey bees.

advisory: Apply Cartap Hydrochloride or Chlorantraniliprole before transplanting for gall midge, stem borer, and other pests.
Select resistant varieties to prevent red rot disease.
Soak setts in specific solution before planting.
Spray Neem Based Pesticide or Profenophos for leaf miner control.
Use yellow sticky traps for Whitefly control.
Spray neem-based pesticide for primary pest infestation.
Spray Metalaxyl + Mancozeb to control Downy mildew.
Plant seedlings uniformly with specific compost and nutrients.
Spray Ethion EC or Spiromesifen SC for mite control.
Spray specific solutions to control leaf blight, stem rot, and root knot nematode.
Insulate the poultry house during winter and ensure proper ventilation.
Provide mineral and calcium to laying birds.
